import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import logo from '../Assets/Image/logo.png' import SearchBarAction from '../Store/Action/SearchBarAction' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const Header = () => { const [SearchInput, SetSearchInput] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(SearchBarAction) }, [dispatch]); const changeHandler = (e) => { SetSearchInput(e.target.value) } return ( <>
changeHandler(e.target.value)} />
Deliver to
Select location
Sign Up
Sign In
Cart
) } export default Header
